name: Lights in the Dark
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 46 (Theme: Keep It Alive).  In Lights in the Dark you explore a dark forest to find firewood to keep your campfire alive.  You can place torches to help light your way but be careful as these torches will consume some of your campfire.  Once you find firewood bring it back to your campfire to refuel it.  While exploring look for a series of pages left by a strange traveler of the path to uncover a small story.

Controls:

- Move = WASD
- Jump = SPACEBAR
- Place Torch = Left Click or E
- Fuel Campfire = Right Click On Campfire (when you have fuel)
- ESC = Quit Game

Note:

Lights in the Dark was created for Ludum Dare 46 using Unity.  We are both pretty knew to Unity so we may have made some mistakes in terms of optimization.  It was really fun though and we learned a bunch of new things!  Anyways thanks so much for checking out our game!

Created Using:

- Unity
- Sublime
- Blender
- Substance Painter
- Substance Alchemist
- Photoshop

Install Instructions:

1. Download .zip file.
2. Unzip .zip file.
3. Open Lights in the Dark.exe
4. Play game (maybe have fun?) To close the game while playing it press Escape.
